title: Comparative Analysis of Vocational Cultures in Technical Writing and Training Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of technical writing and training program development
context.additional_context: Comparative research course focused on developing technical documentation and training materials in the science field.

learning_goals: One can explain the core differences between technical documentation writing and training program development from a vocational culture perspective
One can present the role differences between technical writers and training specialists through case studies based on vocational culture analysis
One can design and comparatively analyze technical documentation and training programs for science fields using project-based approaches
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
